name: Santa Claus Snowball Fight
description:
• Santa Snowball Fight •

Topple over Santa in this Christmas inspired game just in time for the holidays. Santa Snowball Fight is pure and addicting fun!
The game takes in place at the North Pole, where all the elves make presents at night.


FEATURES:

- Fantastic Christmas-themed game
- Practice in tossing snowballs at Santa
- Tons of presents and Christmas trees
- Holiday music for a fun atmosphere
- Level up with precision targeting
- Intuitive friendly interface
